Multi-feature trading strategy¶

Putting it together¶

In this part we’ll look into how to put everything together in order to build a strategy that incorporates different features (technical indicator, macroeconomic trends and sentiment indicator) that comprehensively examine the market as a whole.

Attention

All investments entail inherent risk. This repository seeks to solely educate people on methodologies to build and evaluate algorithmic trading strategies. All final investment decisions are yours and as a result you could make or lose money.
